phase_name: Advanced AI, Video Conferencing, and Administrative Tools

AILearningContext.tsx.description: Context for AI-powered personalized learning recommendations, skill tracking, and adaptive learning paths

VideoRoomContext.tsx.description: Context for video conferencing rooms with WebRTC integration, screen sharing, and real-time communication

ReportBuilderContext.tsx.description: Context for administrative report generation, data visualization, and analytics dashboards

SchedulerContext.tsx.description: Context for scheduled tasks, automated operations, and calendar-based learning management

useSkillGraph.ts.description: Hook for managing skill graph data, node relationships, and learning progress visualization

useWebRTC.ts.description: Hook for WebRTC peer connections, media stream handling, and real-time video/audio communication

KnowledgeGraph.tsx.description: Interactive knowledge graph component for visualizing concept relationships and learning dependencies

VideoRoom.tsx.description: Full-featured video conferencing component with screen sharing, chat, and participant management

ReportBuilder.tsx.description: Report builder component for creating custom analytics reports and data visualizations

SchedulerBoard.tsx.description: Task scheduling board for managing automated tasks, deadlines, and learning schedules

Created to export VideoRoom and communication components
feature_indexes.components/features/admin/index.ts: Updated to include ReportBuilder and SchedulerBoard

contexts/index.ts.description: Updated with all Phase 4 context exports

hooks/index.ts.description: Updated with all Phase 4 hook exports

components/index.ts.description: Updated with all Phase 4 component exports

notes: Phase 4 completes the major feature implementation for the EduCode Platform frontend
Remaining 5% coverage reserved for future enhancements and third-party integrations
All features maintain consistency with established architectural patterns
Real-time communication features require backend WebSocket support for full functionality
Report builder supports future plugin architecture for additional chart types
